name: GreenCupboards
tag_list: green, environmentally-friendly, organic, household-products, cleaning, laundry, kitchen, bathroom, pet, cat, dog
overview:
GreenCupboards is dedicated to certifying and offering household products for sale that are not only environmentally friendly, but also highly effective. Weâ€™ve done the research to help you find the â€œgreenestâ€ and most effective products and conveniently bundled them in what we call â€œCupboards.â€ All of the products offered by GreenCupboards have been tested and certified by GreenCupboards on the basis of five criteria. The GreenCupboards team evaluates ingredients, toxicity, efficacy, manufacturing processes and packaging.

Currently, we are offering GreenCupboards-certified kitchen, bathroom, laundry, dog and cat products. Soon, we will be stocking green baby and personal care supplies. Over time, we intend to purvey environmentally friendly cosmetics, lawn and garden and recreation room goods. GreenCupboards shoppers have the option of purchasing GreenCupboards-certified items in standardized Cupboards, customized Cupboards, in bulk or on a per-item basis.

GreenCupboards aspires to operate in a manner that is akin to a co-op. We genuinely want, and actively encourage, our customers to avidly provide feedback on items purchased, to proactively recommend alternative products and to continually provide other suggestions to optimize the overall GreenCupboards shopping experience. GreenCupboards intends to donate 1% of its pre-tax profits to non-profit organizations promoting a cleaner, self-sustaining environment.
